text: a loko tamari samaksa karana varnana karase, jyare tame temani pase pacha pharaso, tame kahi do ke ava karana varnana na karo, ame kyareya tamane saca nahim mani'e, allaha ta'ala amane tamari janakari api cukyo che ane have pachi pana allaha ane teno payagambara tamari karyaksamata jo'i lese, pachi eni pase pacha pheravavamam avaso, je chupi ane jahera dareka vatone jananara che, pachi te tamane batavi dese je kami tame karata hata
